entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning and late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
